Description: Indicates the number of programs that were recently installed.
Interpretation: The detailed diagnosis of this measure provide details of the Service name, and identified time.

Description: Indicates the number of Windows services that were recently installed.
Interpretation: The detailed diagnosis of this measure provide details of the Service name, and identified time.

Measurement: Configured disabled services found to be running
Description: Indicates the number of disabled services, configured in Services to be Disabled parameter, that are running.
Interpretation: The detailed diagnosis of this measure provide details of the Service name, and identified time.

Description: Indicates the number of services with weak or vulnerable permissions.
Interpretation: The detailed diagnosis of this measure provide details of the Service name, identified time, image path with arguments, and start mode.

Description: Indicates the number of unquoted windows services.
Interpretation: When a service is created whose executable path contains spaces and isn't enclosed within quotes, leads to a vulnerability known as Unquoted Service Path which allows a user to gain SYSTEM privileges. The detailed diagnosis of this measure provide details of the Service name, identified time, image path with arguments, and start mode.
